about.tagline: Timory ( Time + Story ) — Where time, trust, and elegance meet
about.paragraph1: TIMORY is a digital platform designed to help people discover, explore, and compare watches with ease. We bring together watch information, modern technology, and intelligent recommendations to simplify the way users find timepieces that match their style, preferences, and lifestyle.
about.paragraph2: Our goal is to create a transparent and user-friendly environment where watch enthusiasts and everyday users can access reliable information without complexity. TIMORY does not sell watches directly. Instead, we focus on providing curated content and guiding users to official brands and trusted retailers.
about.paragraph3: By combining data-driven insights with artificial intelligence, TIMORY delivers personalized recommendations and a smarter discovery experience. We believe that finding the right watch should be intuitive, informative, and enjoyable.
about.paragraph4: TIMORY is built by a team of developers, designers, and digital strategists who are passionate about technology, product design, and innovation. We are continuously improving the platform to offer better features, better insights, and a better experience for our users.
about.ctaSubtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

watchStory.1.description: Alfred Davis and his brother-in-law Hans Wilsdorf founded Wilsdorf and Davis, the company that would eventually become Rolex SA, in London in 1905. Wilsdorf and Davis's main commercial activity at the time involved importing Hermann Aegler's Swiss movements to England and placing...
watchStory.2.description: The company traces its origins to the mid-19th century, when Polish watchmaker Antoni Patek and his Czech-born Polish business partner Franciszek Czapek formed Patek, Czapek & Cie in Geneva on 1 May 1839 and started...
watchStory.3.description: After graduating early from a jewelry design course in 1981 in New York City, Jacob Arabo opened a small booth in New York City's Diamond District, where he began designing for jewelry labels and private clients. In 1986, Arabo opened his own company, called 'Diamond Quasar'..
watchStory.4.description: Richard Mille is a Swiss luxury watch company founded in 2001 by Dominique Guenat and Richard Mille, based in Les Breuleux, Switzerland. The brand specialises in high-priced clockwork watches, which have been criticised by some as ridiculous and unnecessarily extravagant...
watchStory.5.description: In 1875 Audemars opened his own atelier in his family's farmhouse, dedicated to "complicated" ébauches. Six years later, in 1881, he partnered with his friend and fellow watchmaker Edward Auguste Piguet to create Audemars Piguet & Cie...
watchStory.6.description: In 1848, Louis Brandt founded the company that would become Omega in La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland. He assembled key-wound precision pocket watches from parts supplied by local craftsmen.[13] He sold his watches from Italy to Scandinavia by way of England...
brandStory.1.quote: I tried combining the letters of the alphabet in every possible way. This gave me some hundred names, but none of them felt quite right. One morning, while riding on the upper deck of a horse-drawn omnibus along Cheapside in the City of London, a genie whispered 'Rolex' in my ear.
brandStory.2.quote: Great products begin with deep empathy for people. I design experiences that feel timeless, intuitive, and human.
brandStory.3.quote: Every decision is a story about the future. I work on making sure that story is clear, honest, and long-term.
brandStory.4.quote: Innovation is not about noise, but about quiet breakthroughs that make complex things feel simple.
brandStory.5.quote: Precision engineering is about invisible details. If we do our job right, users only feel effortlessness.
brandStory.6.quote: Luxury should feel personal, not distant. I focus on journeys where users feel guided, understood, and respected.

cs.faq.account.1.question: Do I need an account to use TIMORY?
cs.faq.account.1.answer: No. You can browse watches without creating an account.
cs.faq.account.2.question: What benefits do I get by creating an account?
cs.faq.account.2.answer: An account allows you to save watches, leave comments, and receive personalized recommendations.
cs.faq.account.3.question: How can I reset my password?
cs.faq.account.3.answer: Password reset instructions are available on the login page.
cs.faq.account.4.question: Can I delete my account?
cs.faq.account.4.answer: Yes. You can request account deletion through the Contact Us page.
cs.faq.order.1.question: Can I place orders on TIMORY?
cs.faq.order.1.answer: No. TIMORY does not process orders or payments.
cs.faq.order.2.question: Does TIMORY handle payments?
cs.faq.order.2.answer: No. All payments are handled by third-party sellers or retailers.
cs.faq.order.3.question: Will I receive an order confirmation from TIMORY?
cs.faq.order.3.answer: No. Order confirmations are sent by the seller you purchase from.
cs.faq.order.4.question: Can I track my order through TIMORY?
cs.faq.order.4.answer: No. Order tracking is managed by the seller or retailer.
cs.faq.payment.1.question: Does TIMORY process payments?
cs.faq.payment.1.answer: No. TIMORY does not process or handle any payments.
cs.faq.payment.2.question: Which payment methods are supported on TIMORY?
cs.faq.payment.2.answer: TIMORY does not support payment methods directly. Payments are handled by third-party sellers or retailers.
cs.faq.payment.3.question: Is my payment information stored on TIMORY?
cs.faq.payment.3.answer: No. TIMORY does not collect or store payment information.
cs.faq.payment.4.question: Who should I contact for payment-related issues?
cs.faq.payment.4.answer: Please contact the seller or retailer where the payment was made.
cs.faq.shipping.1.question: Does TIMORY offer shipping services?
cs.faq.shipping.1.answer: No. Shipping is handled by the seller or retailer.
cs.faq.shipping.2.question: Are shipping costs shown on TIMORY?
cs.faq.shipping.2.answer: Shipping costs are determined by the seller and may vary.
cs.faq.shipping.3.question: Can I choose shipping options on TIMORY?
cs.faq.shipping.3.answer: No. Shipping options are selected on the seller's website.
cs.faq.shipping.4.question: Who should I contact for shipping delays?
cs.faq.shipping.4.answer: Please contact the seller directly regarding shipping issues.
cs.faq.returns.1.question: Can I return a product through TIMORY?
cs.faq.returns.1.answer: No. Returns are managed by the seller or retailer.
cs.faq.returns.2.question: Does TIMORY provide refunds?
cs.faq.returns.2.answer: No. Refund policies are determined by the seller.
cs.faq.returns.3.question: Where can I find return policy details?
cs.faq.returns.3.answer: Return policies are available on the seller's website.
cs.faq.returns.4.question: Who should I contact for return-related issues?
cs.faq.returns.4.answer: Please contact the seller from whom you purchased the product.
cs.faq.dealers.1.question: Can dealers list their watches on TIMORY?
cs.faq.dealers.1.answer: Listings are currently managed through selected partnerships.
cs.faq.dealers.2.question: How can a dealer partner with TIMORY?
cs.faq.dealers.2.answer: Dealers can reach out via the Contact Us page.
cs.faq.dealers.3.question: Is there a fee for dealers to join TIMORY?
cs.faq.dealers.4.question: Does TIMORY promote dealer products?
cs.faq.dealers.4.answer: Promotional opportunities may be available through partnerships.
cs.faq.general.1.question: What is TIMORY?
cs.faq.general.1.answer: TIMORY is a digital platform for discovering and comparing watches.
cs.faq.general.2.question: Is TIMORY free to use?
cs.faq.general.2.answer: Yes. TIMORY is free, with optional paid features planned.
cs.faq.general.3.question: Does TIMORY sell watches directly?
cs.faq.general.3.answer: No. TIMORY does not sell watches.
cs.faq.general.4.question: How does TIMORY protect user data?
cs.faq.general.4.answer: TIMORY uses standard security measures to protect user data.
cs.subject: Subject
cs.contactInfoText: We're here to help. If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions regarding the TIMORY platform, please feel free to reach out to us. Our team is always open to hearing from you and improving your experience. Please fill out the contact form below with your details and message. We will review your request and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for using TIMORY.
